Foobar¶

class aioftp.Client(create_connection=None)¶

FTP client.

Parameters:create_connection – (function) factory for creating connections. Using default asyncio.BaseEventLoop.create_connection() if omitted.
connect(host, port=21)¶

Creates connection to server.

Parameters:
  • host – (str) host name for connection
  • port – (int) port number for connection
